title: [Question] Freshers, how was your first day at PESU yesterday?
content: Tell about your experience, hows the environment? How is the faculty?

comments.body: Also if anyone took pictures of the placement stats that they might've shown

I am not from pes but 3 friends i know are from pes ecity. Yesterday was "design thinking" . There was a problem and as a team you need to find solution and make a prototype 

  
Today was a trip to a "gov school" where they painted itseems.
Yes, same had happened when we were freshers too
Been happening for years, we did the same way back in 2018 too
Yea bro, they fabricated it all. No way a B COM graduate got 60 lakhs package in India.
Can you send a picture of something?

do we, kcet round 2 miss fun things?

![gif](giphy|qQdL532ZANbjy)
honestly, DSGNR and the painting the gov school are really good activities cause they are the ones where you actually meet other people and socialise
